name: Login Page Logo
author: Awais Altaf

sections.description:
Customize your admin login page: change the default logo and add your own or your client’s logo.
You also can add width and height to your login page logo.

OR

  1. Download the zip.
  2. Go to Admin Panel -> Plugins -> Add new.
  3. Search, install and activate the plugin.
  4. Click “Upload” and upload the .zip file (you can also upload the unzipped folder to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory via FTP)
  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  6. The Plugin settings appear at Settings -> Login Page Logo.

In case of any difficulties in setting up your plugin, write an email to m.awaisaltaf@gmail.com
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip.
  2. Go to Admin Panel -> Plugins -> Add new.
  3. Search, install and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the zip.
  2. Go to Admin Panel -> Plugins -> Add new.
  3. Search, install and activate the plugin.

Where is settings page in admin?

Please go to Dashboard => Appearence => Login Page Logo

Default width & height of logo ?

If you don’t give width & height of logo it will use default width and height.

short_description: This Plugin lets you customize the Logo of the admin login page panel. Helpful if you need to add a client's (or your own) logo.
